ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List log entries for an incident
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List log entries for an incident
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List log entries for the specified incident.
An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved.
A Log Entry are a record of all events on your account.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List log entries for an incident

List log entries for the specified incident. An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved. A Log Entry are a record of all events on your account. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)

Method: Get

OperationID: listIncidentLogEntries

EndPoint:

/incidents/{id}/log_entries
